channel.title: How do you add
channel.description: 1)When i tele to a place all the monsters att me, how do i change to were i have to att the monster first. 2)how do i move a npc from somewere to somewere eg. the npc is in edge and i want it by the bank. Thanks for your help. Cameron.

item.title: How do you add
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

Ahh inexperienced… Everyone’s gotta learn sometime =]
Autospawn. Just go into autospawn.cfg, and locate the NPC. Searching their X coord or even their name, or ID should be sufficient. Then change X and Y to whatever you want.

NPCHandler. Go to what I said. Under that should be a list of NPC ID’s. All of them are aggressive, and will attack someone within a certain number of spaces. Just take out the ID’s of the monsters you don’t want attacking people.

Simple enough (:

Read full topic

item.title: How do you add
item.dc:creator: @R4nger_0wnz R4nger 0wnz
item.description:
@R4nger_0wnz wrote:

[quote=“o.O O.o, post:2, topic:273351”]The second one is autospawn.cfg.

The first one is NPCHandler,

if(p != null && person != null) //AGRESSIVE NPC

how do i do it in there, what do i do.
